property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Snow Faeries. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return all Snow Faeries from your graveyard and your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Choose a non-evolution creature in the battle zone and add it to its owner's shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Choose a civilization. Until the start of your next turn, creatures of that civilization can't attack you even if your opponent puts them into the battle zone after you cast this spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) {WAVE STRIKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, he can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked and blocked.) ■ This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return a spell from your mana zone to your hand. ■ This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SILENT SKILL} (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its Silent Skill ability.) {SILENT SKILL}: Return up to 3 cards from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SILENT SKILL} (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its Silent Skill ability.) {SILENT SKILL}: Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card from it. Your opponent discards that card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) {WAVE STRIKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose a number. Show your hand to your opponent and discard from it each card that has that cost. Then your opponent shows you his hand and discards from it each card that has that cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Players can't use the {TAP} abilities of their creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) {WAVE STRIKER}

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SILENT SKILL} (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its Silent Skill ability.) {SILENT SKILL}: Put a creature that has Dragon in its race from your mana zone into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of each evolution creature from the battle zone into its owner's mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) {WAVE STRIKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SILENT SKILL} (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its Silent Skill ability.) {SILENT SKILL}: Your light creatures can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) {WAVE STRIKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if your opponent has 3 or fewer shields, draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) {WAVE STRIKER}

property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) {WAVE STRIKER}

property.value: ■ Return up to 2 creatures from your graveyard to your hand.

property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) {WAVE STRIKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature attacks each turn if able. {POWER ATTACKER} +3000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of each of your turns, if this creature broke any shields that turn, return it to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) {WAVE STRIKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put one of them that has "blocker" into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's non-evolution creatures in the battle zone and return it to his hand. Then he discards a card at random from his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Whenever any of your opponent's creatures is destroyed this turn, your opponent chooses a card in his mana zone and puts it into his graveyard. Then he chooses one of his shields and puts it into his graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Choose a card in your opponent's mana zone and put it into his graveyard. Then put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Whenever you summon a creature this turn, search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck that has the same name as that creature and put it into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of each of your turns, you may untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) {WAVE STRIKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) {WAVE STRIKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top card of your opponent's deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Draw up to 2 cards. Then discard a card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature battles, destroy it after the battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) {WAVE STRIKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature gets +2000 power for each tapped creature your opponent has in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SILENT SKILL} (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its Silent Skill ability.) {SILENT SKILL}: Each of your fire creatures in the battle zone gets "double breaker" until the end of the turn. (It breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) {WAVE STRIKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks a creature, this creature gets +3000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) {WAVE STRIKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of each of your turns, if this creature broke any shields that turn, return it to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Search your deck. You may take a multicolored creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) {WAVE STRIKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Choose 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Your opponent chooses one of them, puts it into his hand, and destroys the other one. Then choose 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent chooses one of them, puts it into his hand, and puts the other one into his graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ You can cast this spell only if your opponent has more shields than you do. ■ Your opponent chooses one of his shields for each shield you have. He puts the rest of his shields into his hand. (He can use the "shield trigger" abilities of those shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 5000 or less. When your opponent puts that creature into his graveyard, search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck that has the same cost as that creature and put it into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck.
